reason.raw: Don't worry about this, I'm complicating simple things for no reason. Will rewrite the plugin using gazebo transport.
reason.html: Don't worry about this, I'm complicating simple things for no reason. Will rewrite the plugin using gazebo transport.

description.raw:
Hopefully the documentation on the plugin's header is informative enough. This plugin will be used to verify several of the checkpoints during the finals.

It needs [this](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/146/orientedbox-see-issue-59/diff) ignition math pull request.

I've also added two dependencies:

* ignition-msgs0 (I'm using ignition-msgs_0.6.0, because that uses ign-math2) 

* ignition-transport3 (It looks like the srcsim debs aren't installing any version, so I went ahead and used the latest one)

If adding these dependencies will be too troublesome, I can change the implementation. I did it this way because I thought of porting the plugin to Gazebo 8 soon.
